prs.title: Fix Docker Port Collision
prs.description: Updated docker-compose.yml to use dynamic ports to avoid collisions on port 8080.
prs.author: Alice

prs.title: Add Kubernetes Pod Restart Policy
prs.description: Set restartPolicy for critical pods to Always, and update deployment docs.
prs.author: Bob

prs.title: Implement API Rate Limiter
prs.description: Added token bucket algorithm to backend API service to prevent throttling.
prs.author: Charlie

prs.title: Optimize DB Connection Pool
prs.description: Configured HikariCP pool size to handle high concurrency requests.
prs.author: Diana

discussions.title: Scaling Kubernetes Node Pools
discussions.body: We had issues with autoscaler not keeping up with demand. Discussed setting max node limits.

discussions.title: API Rate Limiter Design
discussions.body: Debated between token bucket and leaky bucket algorithms for API throttling.
